references.paper_title: Vision meets robotics: The KITTI dataset

references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduced Neural Radiance Fields (NeRFs), a novel method for representing 3D scenes as neural networks, revolutionizing the field of novel view synthesis.
